sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>89</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/89</github_url> <message>var strConvertedDateTime = new GlideScheduleDateTime("2022-03-03 06:30:00").convertTimeZone("CET", "IST"); var gdtConvertedDateTime = new GlideDateTime(strConvertedDateTime);  gs.info(gdtConvertedDateTime);  Source: Maik Skoddow</message> <number>TIL0001091</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-03-03 06:19:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>fea3e7b42f82011051dad5f62799b6fc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-03-07 17:30:54</sys_updated_on> <title>Undocumented timezone converter</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
